Description: Please make sure that you selected the folder for the given View of ModelInterfaces-project
i.e. right-click View-folder of the ModelInterfaces-project
You start with LitGenre  DataBase Entity At first generate the pair: LitGenreView  LitGenreViewPage under the group of Web Projects
Under the group of WPF Projects in the ModelInterfaces-project create the folder with a name : LitGenre
To run current batch right-click LitGenre forlder of the step (2)
Project Type of ModelInterfaces: .Net(.Net Core) Class Library
